channel.title: How Do you Make Safe/Wild Zone? What File Do you Change and How?
channel.description:
Im trying to Code a New training area in my Server and i wanna make it a safe zone?? its a wild zone atm Help Would Be Appreciated Thanks - Ryan
**Btw How Do you Change Max Cash The max on my server atm is 999m im trying to Change it to 2147m Ty Again

item.title: How Do you Make Safe/Wild Zone? What File Do you Change and How?
item.dc:creator: @mager_pk mager pk
item.description:
@mager_pk wrote:

[quote=“wootfarren, post:2, topic:296001”]if you have a regular 317…not talking about delta…look up public boolean nonWild() { in client.java…add the coords
|| (absX >= sw && absX <= NE && absY >= SW && absY <= NE)
it makes a box…so south west xcoords then North east xcoords then South west ycoords then north east y coords

and the money thing is in player.java[/quote]
What about in delta?

Read full topic
item.source: How Do you Make Safe/Wild Zone? What File Do you Change and How?

item.title: How Do you Make Safe/Wild Zone? What File Do you Change and How?
item.dc:creator: @wootfarren wootfarren
item.description:
@wootfarren wrote:

if you have a regular 317…not talking about delta…look up public boolean nonWild() { in client.java…add the coords
|| (absX >= sw && absX <= NE && absY >= SW && absY <= NE)
it makes a box…so south west xcoords then North east xcoords then South west ycoords then north east y coords

and the money thing is in player.java

Read full topic
item.source: How Do you Make Safe/Wild Zone? What File Do you Change and How?
